    • Method Detail

      • initialiseGame

        public void initialiseGame()
        Initialises the game and sets the game objects on the canvas

      • startGame

        public void startGame()

      • runGame

        public void runGame()
        Runs the actual game and has a continuous while loop which runs through other methods until the game is finished

      • visible

        public void visible()
        When the score reaches over 500 the second ball is released

      • fastPaceSound

        public void fastPaceSound()
        Plays a specific sound from the game folder which is named fastSpeed.wav but only if the fastPaced variable is set to 2

      • checkScore

        public void checkScore()
        Checks the score and whenever it reaches a certain point, the game will link to the fastPaceSound method and play the wav file Also checks that when levelTwo is finished, it will give the user a message box along with a victory sound file

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(java.io.File Sound)
        Method which enables sound to be played
        Parameters:
        Sound - two parameters are required (the file, and the sound).
